law.catch_line: The following individuals are members of the Judges' Retirement System:...

text.section:
The following individuals are members of the Judges' Retirement System:
a judge of the Court of Appeals, Court of Special Appeals, circuit court of a county, or District Court of Maryland;
a member of the State Workers' Compensation Commission; and
a master in chancery or master in juvenile causes who:
was appointed by the circuit court of a county on or before June 30, 1989; and
serves full time as a master.
A former judge who is temporarily assigned to sit in a court of the State under the authority of Article IV, § 3A of the Maryland Constitution is not a member.
